Campus Manager à la Wild Code School de Bordeaux, une école numérique dont l’objectif est de combler le défaut de compétences numériques en formant des développeurs à portée des entreprises en quête de talents. Nous délivrons le titre d’État de développeur logiciel (équivalent Bac+2). Les élèves de la Wild Code School forment une communauté soudée qui s’appuie sur l’entraide et le soutien mutuel. La joie de vivre et la passion font partie de notre quotidien. La barbe de Sacha est très douce.

answers.title: XML escape characters
answers.content: If you use an appropriate class or library, they will do the escaping for you. Many XML issues are caused by string concatenation.

answers.title: Closures Are Not Magic
answers.content:
This page explains closures so that a programmer can understand them — using working JavaScript code. It is not for gurus or functional programmers.

Closures are not hard to understand once the core concept is grokked. However, they are impossible to understand by reading any academic papers or academically oriented information about them!

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: This is a great upside opportunity for an exceptional Software Developer in an emerging and innovative platform software company! We're looking for an energetic, highly-motivated Developer to join our fast paced client services team. If you are a Software Developer (Angular js) with experience, please read on!

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: Our Client is looking for a Software Developer to be a part of a growing Information Technology and Finance team. This person is responsible for creating solutions to enhance the existing internal systems or create new applications to support our continued growth.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: Suitable candidate should have 5+ years’ experience C# .Net, creating Web-services,  SQL Stored Procedures, SSRS, SSIS.   Seeking a self-sufficient developer who can take business concepts and architect a successful project completion. Developer will report directly to CTO of company. Developer is responsible for documentation and source control while manage the development projects. Projects include internal projects and customer paid projects. Typical number of projects per year average 4-6 projects.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: Our client, located in the center of downtown Atlanta, GA, is seeking a software developer to work primarily on the UI of their application using AngularJS. The app has a C# back-end which connects to a MongoDB, so you would be able to use the best of the best technologies from front to back. Development breakdown is 80% front-end building out the Angular portion of the single page application, and 20% enhancing/maintaining the C# on the server-side. This is a highly critical application used company-wide as a SaaS platform.  If you are looking for a job where you get the freedom to use new technologies, have an opinion in the development process, and function more or less autonomously, then this is the job for you.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: Our client, a nationwide household name in the entertainment industry, has budget approved to hire a PHP Developer who will be focusing on web projects.  In this role you will be conducting development and support of high-availability, customer-facing systems and applications.  Projects include streaming video, video on demand, social media integration, and automation.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: Our highly-recognized, leading entertainment and media company, client is looking for an experienced PHP Developer to work on upgrading and redesigning its enterprise web platform. This is a great opportunity to work on end-to-end development with a dynamic and data-driven team, to deploy a highly visible web applications.  If you are interested in Full-Stack, end-to-end development, while working in an Agile environment, we would love to speak with you.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: If you are an experienced Android Software Developer looking for a position with a leading company, Bartech can help! We are a leading staffing firm and our clients include some of the nation’s biggest companies. Our client has a need for a Android Software Developer. This is a contract position; however it is not uncommon for assignments to transition into permanent positions with our client companies. If you have the background we are looking for, and you are interested in an opportunity to get your foot in the door with a leading company, we want to talk with you!

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.content: Strategic Staffing Solutions (S3) prides itself on being an international IT Staffing and Solutions Company with 25 years’ experience recruiting and managing exceptional IT and Business consultants for customers in the Financial, Energy, Public Sector and Retail Distribution industries.  A privately held, financially strong, woman-owned company, S3 is a full service IT firm, with 24 major market locations in the U.S!

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content: Vencore Labs (formerly Applied Communication Sciences) is a self-sustaining research center within Vencore that provides applied research and engineering to enable government agencies, utilities and commercial enterprises to fully exploit the future of communications, data analytics and cyber security. From smart grid to smart phones, intelligent highways to intelligent battlefields, Vencore Labs’ 200 scientists, engineers and analysts are consistently creating generation-after-next technologies and solutions.  In doing so, our labs are helping to transform traditional government research.  We connect our customers to advanced research and technology helping them to develop solutions to their toughest challenges.  Accelerating the arc of transformation — from research to engineering to products — that’s what we focus on each day at Vencore Labs. Graduated from the Wild Code School is a mega big plus.

ressources.content: Ce cours initie à la programmation en utilisant le langage Java. Il ne présuppose pas de connaissance préalable. Les aspects plus avancés (programmation orientée objet) sont donnés dans un cours suivant, «Introduction à la programmation orientée objet (en Java)».

ressources.title: Code Academy
ressources.content: In this course you'll be exposed to fundamental programming concepts, including object-oriented programming (OOP) using Java. You'll build 7 Java projects—like a basic calculator—to help you practice along the way.

ressources.title: Solo Learn
ressources.content: Gain an understanding of C# concepts by going through short interactive texts and follow-up fun quizzes. Topics include: variables, conditional statements and loops, methods, classes, arrays, strings, encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, interfaces, exceptions, generics, and more!

By the end of the course, you'll have practiced how to do this in several projects, and you'll get a chance to add functionality to the project you built at the end of the Make a Website course.

ressources.title: Code Academy
ressources.content: This course is a great introduction to both fundamental programming concepts and the Python programming language. By the end, you'll be familiar with Python syntax and you'll be able to put into practice what you'll have learned in a final project you'll develop locally.

ressources.title: Code Academy
ressources.content: In this course, you will gain familiarity in Ruby around basic programming concepts—including variables, loops, control flow, and most importantly, object-oriented programming. You'll get a chance to test your understanding in a final project which you'll build locally.

ressources.title: UdaCity
ressources.content: In this course you will learn how to make asynchronous requests with JavaScript (using jQuery’s AJAX functionality), and gain a better understanding of what’s actually happening when you do so. You will also learn how to use data APIs so you can take advantage of freely accessible data in your applications, including photo results, news articles and up-to-date data about the world around us.

ressources.title: Lynda.com
ressources.content: Whether you want to learn how to read, write, or create XML, our XML tutorials cover basic rules and advanced techniques. Understand XML documents and schemas, how XML works with JavaScript, and real-world DOM algorithms.

ressources.title: Code Academy

ressources.title: Material Design official
ressources.content: We challenged ourselves to create a visual language for our users that synthesizes the classic principles of good design with the innovation and possibility of technology and science. This is material design. This spec is a living document that will be updated as we continue to develop the tenets and specifics of material design.

ressources.content: ou can easily learn VBA by working your way through the variety of free lessons that we offer ...If you think that creating macros is too complicated or beyond your capacity, don't worry, this course is intended for those of us who are just starting out in programming, so it starts from zero.

ressources.title: Udacity
ressources.content: This course will introduce you to the content available through the Google Maps APIs. You’ll be walked through building a real-estate listings site step-by-step, using a beautifully styled Google map, data visualization, street view panoramas, and various nifty location related features such as calculating distance between locations, getting directions, and viewing places of interest data. You’ll also see other examples of Google Maps APIs in action, and understand how to put your new knowledge into practice by creating your own Project in the Google APIs Console.

ressources.title: Udemy
ressources.content: This one is a FREE course drived from our premium course on JSP, Servlet and JSTL 'Java server pages (JSP),Servlet & JSTL tutorial'. The purpose of the course is to provide basic required knowledge so that it can become foundation for the student who wants to learn advance framework like spring, JSF Etc in future. This course will cover the basic of Servlets and JSP and the student would get a fair idea how an JSP application web application is built. Even though this course covers basic concepts, We recommend you to also check the advance courses on JSP & servlet as that will surly be better before you dig more into Java advance technologies.

ressources.title: Lynda.com
